definition: a period of time/phase/stage/classifier for issues of a periodical, courses of study/time/term/period/to hope/Taiwan pr. [qi2]

sentences.english: Thursday is market day in poitiers.
sentences.chinese: 星期四是普瓦捷的趕集日。

sentences.english: Let's make a date to go shopping next Thursday.
sentences.chinese: 我們就定在下星期四去買東西吧。

sentences.english: Thursdays's powerful quake was an unwelcome reminder of the disasters nearly one month ago.
sentences.chinese: 星期四的強地震是近一個月前災難不受歡迎的提醒。

sentences.english: We have art class on Thursday.
The attacks began late Wednesday and continued into Thursday morning.
sentences.chinese: 襲擊從星期三後半夜開始，持續到星期四早晨。

sentences.english: We were together in the Thursday night drama society.
sentences.chinese: 我們過去總在星期四晚上的話劇社裏聚會。

sentences.english: Harbor Messenger doesn't come out until Thursday.
sentences.chinese: 《港灣先驅報》要到星期四纔出。

sentences.english: The measure is advancing toward a final vote late Thursday, Christmas Eve.
sentences.chinese: 這項議案將於聖誕節的除夕夜星期四表決。

sentences.english: The monthly meeting has been postponed until next Thursday.
sentences.chinese: 月會已經延到了下星期四。

sentences.english: Expect price before thursday market firm.
sentences.chinese: 市場穩定，望星期四前報價。

sentences.english: Dick and I are to be married at Christ Church at noon on Thursday, the tenth.
sentences.chinese: 和我訂於本月10日星期四正午在基督教堂結婚。

sentences.english: We moved out on Wednesday and the new tenants moved in Thursday .
sentences.chinese: 我們是星期三遷出去的，新房客星期四就搬了進去。

sentences.english: The boat-race has been officially fixed for Thursday, April 2.
sentences.chinese: 划船比賽已正式定於4月2日星期四舉行。

sentences.english: Students reading newspapers during the class teacher period every Wednesday and Thursday morning.
sentences.chinese: 逢星期三及星期四的班主任時間內，同學均會閱報。

sentences.english: Practices are Tuesdays and Fri- days after school.
sentences.chinese: 練習是星期四和星期五的放學後。

sentences.english: What's more, Thursday's scene enrolling attracted the most number of students.
sentences.chinese: 此外，人氣最旺的首推星期四的現場報名。
